entries.journal_entry_description: Dr. Price suspects that the Trandoshans are infecting their captive Wookiees with a disease that lowers their life expectancy. In order to confirm his suspicions, he needs to get blood samples from a healthy Wookiee living in its natural environment and a recently captured Wookiee who has yet to be processed.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Dr. Price also needs a blood sample from a Wookiee that has been captured but not processed by the Trandoshans. There are several Wookiee captives located in the Trandoshan slave camps that should be perfect specimens.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Dr. Price has requested that you collect a blood sample from a healthy Wookiee. He noticed one in his research that will fit the bill living in a small Wookiee village south of the Trandoshan slave camps.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Now that you have both an untainted and tainted sample, deliver them back to Dr. Price.
